SettingsPage.changeEmailDescription: Change email that's used for signing in. You'll need to confirm your new email by clicking on the link that will be sent to your new email.
SettingsPage.changePasswordDescription: Change password that's used for signing in. Use at least 6 letters with special characters.
SettingsPage.deleteProfileDescription: You will lose access to all of your notes and posts. This action cannot be undone.
